original: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha, the teacher of the unobstructed.

original: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa rma bya chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa rma bya chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By holding this, the noble Mahāmāyūrī will be held.

original: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so ////
translated: The heart of the noble Mahāmāyūrī is complete.
